content: the wicked wildlings are a group of voodoo doll themed animals the perfect mix of spooky and cute wicked wildlings - cinderpaw - bear 4 5mm hook - worsted weight yarn in two colors - one main color one contrasting color gray for one leg & black yarn floss or crochet thread for stitches button for one eye and a safety nose safety nose and button can be replaced by stitching them on or crocheting them if you prefer felt or piece of fabric for heart
